alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Loup; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 7:11PM CDT until May 29 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Loup County in north central Nebraska... Garfield County in north central Nebraska... Western Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 711 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area, or 9 miles north of Burwell, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Burwell, Bartlett, Ericson, Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area, Virginia Smith Dam, Hannamon Bayou Campground, Buffalo Flats, Carson Lake, Homestead Knolls Campground, Cumminsville, Four Corners, Nunda Shoal Campground, Deverre, Valley View Flat Campground and Gables. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 129 and 135. Highway 281 between mile markers 142 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
